```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Map

```{r}
data <- read_csv("WoolworthsLocations.csv")

pal <- colorFactor(palette = 'Dark2', domain = data$Type)

map <- leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addCircleMarkers(lng = data$Long, lat = data$Lat, radius = 3, color = pal(data$Type), label = data$Store)


map
```
